TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeReturnReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter
Public MustInherit Class MimeReturnReader Inherits MimeFormatter

summary.span: 針對使用 HTTP 實作但不使用 SOAP 之 Web 服務用戶端的連入回應傳回值的讀取器，提供一般基底實作。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for readers of incoming response return values for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 類別會建立一般所有用戶端讀取資料的 HTTP 回應資料流到 Web 方法的傳回值的介面。The class establishes a common interface for all client-side reading of HTTP response streams into Web method return values. 您通常不需要 distinct或其直接下階的類別。You typically will not need touse or its descendant classes directly. 相反地，當 Wsdl.exe 工具產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼，根據 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 的實作，它會套用每個 Web 方法，並設定屬性的屬性衍生的類別從。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the class, which is derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Read (System.Net.WebResponse response, System.IO.Stream responseStream);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Read(class System.Net.WebResponse response, class System.IO.Stream responseStream) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Read (response As WebResponse, responseStream As Stream) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ Read(System::Net::WebResponse ^ response, System::IO::Stream ^ responseStream);

param.name: response
param.span: 物件，包含作業的輸出訊息。

span.span: A object containing the output message for an operation.

param.name: responseStream
param.span: ，其內容為 參數所表示的 HTTP 回應主體。

span.span: A whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the parameter.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將 HTTP 回應還原序列化成 Web 方法傳回值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes an HTTP response into a Web method return value.

returns.span: HTTP 回應會還原序列化成 Web 方法傳回值。

span.span: An HTTP response deserialized into a Web method return value.
